products.title: Splash Frost Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash frost roller blind in white. Made to measure from 7.96 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash frost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour. It will freshen up any space within the home or office. Splash frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product. 
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx1579 fabric colour: frost material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Splash Ivory Off-White Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash ivory off-white roller blind in white/cream. Made to measure from 9.35 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Ivory off-white is a fabulous shade, perfect to pair with natural wooden tones in the home. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Snow White Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash snow white electric roller blind in white. Made to measure from 122.00 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room. Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe. This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with their smart hub (sold seperately). Splash snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.
